explanation: [0-0] A short-haired man in an orange T-shirt sits facing away from the camera at a table, holding two Russian nesting dolls. There are two black mats on the yellow wooden table, with two wooden chairs beside them. A hand reaches towards the man's head. The wall in the background is pale yellow.

[0-5] Then, the hand hits the man in the orange shirt on the head. Next, the shot changes to the man in the orange shirt facing the camera, pointing forward and laughing hysterically. Subsequently, the shot changes again to the man picking up the nesting dolls, turning his head to look at the camera, and making a funny face. Then, the man lies on the brown carpet, writhing and laughing.

[5-9] Next, the man sits back in the chair, happily waving a frying pan in his hand. The shot then cuts to the ground, where he is lying on the floor in terror, crawling backwards. Another man in the same outfit appears in the frame, holding a frying pan, pulling the leg of the man lying on the ground, and laughing happily. Finally, the shot changes to the man in the orange shirt standing in the room with a frying pan, pulling the leg of a man lying on the ground dressed identically to himself and waving the frying pan in his hand. The man on the ground reaches out to block him.
